scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:assets && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:html
scripts.copy:assets: copyfiles -u 1 imgs/**/* dist/imgs && copyfiles -u 1 public/**/* dist/public && copyfiles -u 1 favicon/**/* dist/favicon && copyfiles -u 1 data/**/* dist/data
scripts.minify:css: postcss css/blog.css -o dist/css/blog.min.css --no-map && postcss css/global.css -o dist/css/global.min.css --no-map && postcss css/index.css -o dist/css/index.min.css --no-map && postcss css/post.css -o dist/css/post.min.css --no-map && postcss css/queries.css -o dist/css/queries.min.css --no-map
scripts.minify:js: terser js/blog.js -o dist/js/blog.min.js && terser js/effects.js -o dist/js/effects.min.js && terser js/main.js -o dist/js/main.min.js && terser js/post.js -o dist/js/post.min.js
scripts.minify:html: html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --keep-closing-slash --minify-css true --minify-js true --ignore-custom-fragments "<style.*?</style>" index.html -o dist/index.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --keep-closing-slash --minify-css true --minify-js true --ignore-custom-fragments "<style.*?</style>" blog.html -o dist/blog.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --keep-closing-slash --minify-css true --minify-js true --ignore-custom-fragments "<style.*?</style>" post.html -o dist/post.html
